111  public function parseContent($keyValues){
112  $msg=$this->_message;
113  foreach ($keyValues as $key=>$value){
114  $msg=str_replace("{".$key."}", $value, $msg);
115  }
116  $this->_message=$msg;
117  return $this;
118  }
